description.en: Rejects non-factual output by applying structural pattern constraints; restricts speculative mimicry.
description.zh: 拒絕產出非事實性輸出，並抑制推測性模擬語氣。

trigger.en: When output matches speculative or unverifiable pattern set.
trigger.zh: 當輸出語句符合已知的虛構或無法驗證語義模式時。

enforcement.en: Applies logical structure check and blocks speculative responses.
enforcement.zh: 啟用結構驗證機制，阻擋推測性回應輸出。
